qgisprocess 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Convert sf objects to/from QGIS inputs/outputs

Source: R/compat-sf.R
as_qgis_argument.sf.Rd

Convert sf objects to/from QGIS inputs/outputs

# S3 method for sf
as_qgis_argument(x, spec = qgis_argument_spec(), use_json_input = FALSE)

# S3 method for crs
as_qgis_argument(x, spec = qgis_argument_spec(), use_json_input = FALSE)

# S3 method for bbox
as_qgis_argument(x, spec = qgis_argument_spec(), use_json_input = FALSE)

# S3 method for sfc
as_qgis_argument(x, spec = qgis_argument_spec(), use_json_input = FALSE)

# S3 method for POINT
as_qgis_argument(x, spec = qgis_argument_spec(), use_json_input = FALSE)

Arguments

x

An object passed to a QGIS processing algorithm

spec

A list() with values for algorithm, name, description, and qgis_type. See qgis_argument_spec() to create a blank spec for testing.

use_json_input

TRUE if the outputs will be serialized as JSON instead of serialized as a command-line argument.

Contents

Developed by Dewey Dunnington, Floris Vanderhaeghe, Jan Caha.
